dimpaintings.configuration.netherMaxY.to:
Dictates the max Y at which the Nether Painting will place you in the Nether
[For a vanilla nether it's recommended to keep the value between 10 and 120
[51 = Spawn in a bubble at Y 50 if nothing] (Default: 120)
dimpaintings.configuration.overworldToBe: Dictates if the overworld painting will teleport you back to your spawnpoint / bed (Similar to teleporting from the End to the Overworld)
dimpaintings.configuration.teleportCoold: Amount of seconds between being able to teleport (Default: 4)
dimpaintings.same_dimension: Can't teleport to the same dimension
